pages.title: Peccary
pages.text: The white-lipped peccary ($(o)Tayassu pecari$()) is a species of peccary found in Central and South America and the only member of the genus Tayassu.$(br2)Multiple subspecies have been identified.

pages.title: Peccary
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:beetroot$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 4 Days
